name: Primal Rage [SG]
description:
Primal Rage is an arcade-fighting game developed by Atari Games, Probe Software and Teeny Weeny Games. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Atari. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Primal Rage is available on SEGA Saturn, SEGA 32X, Game Gear and Game Boy.
